titles.title: Louisiana Road Home Act
A bill to require the State of Louisiana to match Federal funding to fully address the Road Home Program shortfall.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 9/6/2007--Introduced. Louisiana Road Home Act - Authorizes appropriations for the state of Louisiana to carry out the Road Home Program, provided that as of June 1, 2007, the state has provided at least $1 billion for the Program.
